      • save

        public void save(T object)
          throws BusinessException
        Saves entity:
        1. calls "validate(object)"
        2. calls "validateUniqueFields(object)"
        3. check if any excpetion occurred
        4. if entity id is null then calls "save", if not, calls "merge"
        Parameters:
        object -
        Throws:
        BusinessException
